detailed_info.name: Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate
detailed_info.description: Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate is made from coconut oil fatty acids and an amino acid, glutamate (present in the structural protein (collagen) of human skin). It is a rather mild anionic surfactant, used in organic formulas.
